attributes.action: Award David Gourlay Head Coach of Scotland's High Performance squad an MBE
attributes.additional_details:
David Gourlay has won every honour there is to win within the sport of bowls. As Head Coach of Scotland's Lawn Bowls Commonwealth Games team he has just successfully guided the team to another 5 medals at the games in Australia. He adds this to the 3 gold medals the team won at Glasgow 2014.
This is the icing on the cake for him after claiming 2 of the 3 ranking tournaments on the World Indoor Bowls Tour. A feat that moves him back to World Number 2 this award is long overdue
attributes.background: Consummate professional within a sport he has loved for over 40 years. Respected by his peers and all in the sport of Lawn Bowls

rejection.details:
